content:
Prodam zlo ugodno star okoli 2 leti, lepo ohranjen.
Prodam tudi 2Xrainbow hammer, vse zlo ugodno.
 
	

	
	
		
		

		
			
		
		
	


	
		
	


 
Specifications
RMS Power 4 Ohm
2 x 200W
RMS Power 2 Ohm
2 x 300W
RMS Power 4 Ohm mono
1 x 600W
THD (A-weight)
< 0, 08%
Input sensitivity
200mV - 4.5 V
Low Pass (24 dB/oct)
40 - 4000 Hz
High Pass (24 dB/oct)
15 - 4000 Hz
High Pass & Low Pass filters can be used at the same time
so them can be used as a bandpass filters. High Pass filter
can also be used as a Subsonic filter for subwoofer.
Dimensions (W x H x L)
222 x 54 x 400 mm
author: beyond
